Investigative Journalist

Investigative journalist focused on the impact of technology on society

James Thompson

James Thompson is an experienced technical writer and editor with a talent for making complex technical concepts accessible to diverse audiences. He specializes in developer documentation and technical communication.

Skills

  • Technical Writing
  • Documentation Design
  • Content Strategy
  • Technical Editing

Experience

  • Lead technical writer at multiple tech companies
  • Editor for technical publications
  • Consultant for documentation projects
  • Speaker at technical communication conferences

Background

James has over 12 years of experience in technical communication and holds a master’s degree in Technical Writing from Carnegie Mellon University.
